name: Hgee
tagline: A word editor for HGE (Hulixerian Game Engine)
body:
### Hulixerian Game Engine Editor This project aimed for making scene creation easier and faster for HGE applications.
HGE is a game engine that use OpenGL for rendering and written by C++11 and it is completely cross-platform.
### Project aims 0- Using new pipeline of OpenGL.
1- Using most update techniques and technologies.
2- Using Linux and more specifically Gnome environment.
3- Keeping code as simple as possible.
4- Keeping good design for making future changes easier.
### Authors and Contributors Creator, designed and implementer:
Hossein Noroozpour @Hossein-Noroozpour
Email address: Hossein.Noroozpour@GMail.com
### Support or Contact You can find me on Skype (Hossein-Noroozpour) or mail me via Hossein.Noroozpour@GMail.com
